name: CAO - Bones - Matador
additionalNotes: The inspiration that CAO brand ambassador Rick Rodriguez used for his newest creation with the Nicaraguan-based CAO blending team. Both the name, CAO Bones, and the various size names reflect terms commonly found in a game of dominos. Hailing from the STG Estelí factory in Nicaragua, Bones uses a dark Connecticut broadleaf wrapper to encase a Connecticut shade binder and a filler combination of Nicaraguan tobacco, Dominican Piloto Cubano and Honduran leaf that together produce a solid burning, medium- to full-bodied profile that even the most experienced aficionado can enjoy.
